title: Winning streak in ranked as Teemo
body:
I just started playing ranked and I'm doing my provisional games. So far I've done 5 solo ranked games and have won all of them as Teemo in each game. Does this say anything about my skills or is it just luck?

http://www.lolskill.net/summoner/NA/FendiSTER/matches

replies.body: Absolute and pure luck. Welcome to the joke that is ranked.
You're item builds are almost the same, if not the same every match. I would say it is luck because you aren't really building to counter.
Am I supposed to study every item in the game? How do I know what counters what champ?
I climbed from silver 5 to silver 1 This season with Teemo. Change the way you build you will climb faster!
